issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports protecting and expanding the Affordable Care Act, lowering prescription drug costs, and improving access to healthcare

issues.title: Climate Change and Clean Energy
issues.description: Advocates for aggressive climate action, supporting renewable energy investments and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Border Security and Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, border security, and a path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants

issues.title: Education and Workforce Development
issues.description: Supports increased funding for public education, student debt relief, and job training programs

issues.title: Economic Recovery and Job Creation
issues.description: Advocates for infrastructure investment, small business support, and middle-class tax relief

issues.title: Gun Safety Legislation
issues.description: Supports universal background checks, assault weapons ban, and other gun control measures

issues.title: Veterans Support
issues.description: Supports improved veterans healthcare, mental health services, and job training for veterans

issues.title: Foreign Policy and National Security
issues.description: Supports strong international alliances, diplomatic approaches to global challenges, and military readiness
